title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 16, 2020
description: It's the birthday of English philosopher and playwright Catharine Trotter Cockburn (1679), who taught herself to read and write when she was a child.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of English philosopher and playwright Catharine Trotter Cockburn (1679), who taught herself to read and write when she was a child.
